resources.string: Do you want to delete configuration \'%1$s\'?
Emulator currently runs configuration \'%1$s\'. Do you want to launch new configuration?
Emulator currently runs configuration \'%1$s\'. Do you want to stop emulation?
Tap on the \'+\' icon to create a new configuration.
Error during initialization of the emulator (error code: %1$d). Please report error code and your device model to mobile@puder.org.

Tap on the \'+\' icon to create a new configuration. A configuration defines the TRS-80 model and the disk images used for the emulation. Click on a configuration and then the Play icon to run it. Note that currently only Model 3 emulation is supported.

A configuration defines the parameters used by the emulator. Select the TRS-80 model to emulate. Note that currently only Model 3 emulation is supported. If no disk images are defined, the TRS-80 ROM will launch the Basic interpreter. Disk images need to be copied to the SD card. This app does not contain disk images for copyright reasons. You can search the Internet for \'TRS-80 disk images\'. Different keyboard types can be configured for portrait and landscape orientation. The original keyboard mimics the layout of the TRS-80 keyboard. The compact layout is appropriate for smaller screen sizes.

The Emulator tab shows the currently running emulator. To launch the emulator, switch to the Configurations tab and select a configuration. Use the Play icon to play/resume the emulator. Use the Stop icon to end the current emulation.

The emulator requires the original ROM images of the various TRS-80 models. ROM images for the TRS-80 need to be copied to the SD card before using this app. For copyright reasons this app does not bundle ROM images. You can find them on the Internet (for example here).
